verbs.description: [ARG1: 6-foot alligator] [V: found] [ARGM-LOC: in kansas city hot tub] a missouri landlord stumbled upon an unwanted house guest while evicting a tenant a large alligator in a hot tub the tenant described the 150-pound reptile as gentle as a puppy after animal control workers were called to the kansas city home on wednesday the workers also found two boa constrictors and a rabbit the kansas city star reports a specialist removed the alligator which was at least 6 feet 1 8 meters long no one was injured city kansas alligator monkey island kansas city sean casey city neighborhood and housing services department kansas city star citys neighborhood and housing services department missouri 6-foot kansas city missouri
